Ministerstwo obiecuje niższe rachunki, nowe miejsca pracy i czystsze powietrze — ale koszt zmian sięgnie nawet 3,5 bln zł. Takie są założenia Krajowego Planu w dziedzinie Energii i Klimatu.

Wysokie stopy procentowe, mocna gospodarka i niskie bezrobocie napędzają tę branżę, której kapitały są najwyższe w historii. KNF właśnie ujawniła nowe warunki wypłat dywidend na 2026 r.

articles.title: KNF zawiadamia prokuraturę w sprawie państwowej spółki. Chodzi o wykorzystanie informacji poufnej
articles.summary: Komisja Nadzoru Finansowego informuje, że podjęła "środki prawne w celu przeciwdziałania naruszeniu przepisów Rozporządzenia 596/20141, w związku z transakcjami zawartymi w obrocie akcjami Energa". Sprawa ma związek z wielką transakcją Orlenu, który pod koniec ubiegłego miesiąca ogłosił zamiar nabycia wszystkich akcji spółki Energa, co umożliwi mu pełne przejęcie kontroli nad spółką.

articles.summary: USA przygotowują nowe sankcje na wypadek, gdyby Rosja odrzuciła projekt umowy pokojowej w sprawie zakończenia jej wojny z Ukrainą - podała w środę agencja Bloomberga, powołując

articles.title: Awantura o MiG-i dla Ukrainy. BBN i rząd przerzucają się oskarżeniami
articles.summary: Współpracownicy prezydenta Karola Nawrockiego przekroczyli „granice chamstwa i kłamstwa” - ocenił w środę wicepremier, szef MON Władysław Kosiniak-Kamysz. Jak mówił, chodzi m.in

articles.title: 2500 uczniów i studentów wzięło udział w kolejnej – już VII edycji "Our Future Forum"!
articles.summary: Forum to największa polska konferencja skierowana do młodego pokolenia. Uczestnicy z całego kraju dyskutowali o polityce, przyszłości gospodarki czy technologii z ministrami, prezesami największych polskich firm, artystami oraz naukowcami.

articles.title: Consumers are feeling gloomy about the economy. Here's why they're spending anyway
articles.summary: Consumer sentiment is low and the job market is shaky. Shoppers are still spending during the holidays.

articles.title: What Trump's reclassification of pot and CBD could mean for seniors, research and stocks
articles.summary: Reclassification to a Schedule III drug and possible Medicare coverage for pot could unlock new investment from pharmaceutical companies.

articles.title: Startup backed by Altman, JPMorgan announces capital lending partnership with Amazon
articles.summary: Slope, an AI lending platform backed by JPMorgan Chase, told CNBC exclusively that it is launching a partnership with Amazon's independent sellers.

articles.title: Birkin bag prices are sinking at auction despite high-profile sales
articles.summary: Luxury experts say aspirational luxury consumers are facing new pressures from inflation and a slowing job market, meaning fewer Birkin buyers at auction.

articles.title: Kraft Heinz taps former Kellanova CEO Steve Cahillane to lead company ahead of breakup
articles.summary: Steve Cahillane previously led Kellogg through its own breakup two years ago.

articles.title: Ford to record $19.5 billion in special charges as it pulls back on EV plans
articles.summary: The charges are related to a restructuring of its business priorities and a pullback in its all-electric vehicle investments, Ford announced Monday.

articles.title: Frontier Airlines replaces longtime CEO Barry Biffle with carrier's president
articles.summary: Frontier Airlines is replacing its CEO, Barry Biffle, with the carrier's president.

articles.title: Pfizer’s modest 2026 outlook shows its big investments will take time to pay off
articles.summary: Pfizer has pursued deals of all sizes to build new revenue streams, but the outlook underscores that those investments are still some distance from paying off.

articles.title: As catastrophe losses top $100 billion again, insurers are helping policyholders mitigate risk
articles.summary: Wildfires and severe storms are the main driver of losses, accounting for 83% of the total insured losses, according to Swiss Re.

articles.title: Activist investor Elliott reportedly takes $1 billion stake in Lululemon, eyes new CEO
articles.summary: Activist investor Elliott Management has taken a sizeable stake in Lululemon Athletica and has a potential CEO candidate in hopes of turning around the company’s fortunes, according to a new report.

articles.title: Medical supply firm Medline jumps more than 40% in debut after biggest IPO of 2025
articles.summary: Medline priced at $29 per share on Tuesday, raising $6.26 billion to cap off a strong year for new listings and bolster optimism about 2026.

articles.title: Micron can’t keep up with its massive demand, and its stock is soaring
articles.summary: The chip maker has been a victim of souring AI sentiment lately, but its upbeat outlook has Wall Street feeling better about the path forward.

articles.title: DoorDash joins Instacart in the newest shopping battleground — ChatGPT
articles.summary: DoorDash Inc. on Wednesday said it had joined forces with OpenAI to allow people to shop for groceries in ChatGPT and check out on the delivery platform itself, as artificial intelligence becomes a bigger competitive front for online shopping.

articles.title: Oracle’s stock falls on a fear one analyst says should be ‘almost irrelevant’
articles.summary: New rumors of stalled data-center funding have sent Oracle’s stock lower, but some experts argue the negative narrative has gotten too harsh.

articles.title: From puppies to superheroes, Chinese AI toys are bringing hugs — and hesitation
articles.summary: China's AI toy industry is growing as Beijing pushes companies and consumers to integrate the technology.

articles.title: 'Stranger Things' ushered in a new era for Netflix
articles.summary: A lot has changed since its first season in 2016, as Netflix has announced dozens of "Stranger Things" partnerships and collaborations with brands.

articles.title: Disney's 'Zootopia 2' to hit $1 billion box office, only the second Hollywood film to do so this year
articles.summary: Disney Animation's "Zootopia 2" is set to cross the billion-dollar box-office mark on Friday, becoming the second Hollywood film to reach the benchmark in 2025.
